## ZoteroCompat.getDOMParser() method

Get DOMParser.

For Zotero 6: mainWindow.DOMParser or nsIDOMParser

For Zotero 7: Firefox 102 support DOMParser natively

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDOMParser(): DOMParser;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

DOMParser
